allOf.description: The base booking object with all fields, to be inherited

state.description: The life-cycle state of the booking

fare.description: A fare/price as billed from the user in POINTs

cost.description: A fare/price as billed by a TSP from MaaS in EUR

currency.description: Accepted monetary unit in ISO 4127 format, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217#cite_note-1

leg.description: MaaS response may return any subset of legCore

allOf.description: A place, as a location-name pair
Geographic latitude-longitude object in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lat.description: Geographic latitude (north-south axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lon.description: Geographic longitude (east-west axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

allOf.description: A place, as a location-name pair
Geographic latitude-longitude object in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lat.description: Geographic latitude (north-south axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lon.description: Geographic longitude (east-west axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

anyOf.description: A mode that involves using your personal vehicle or legs
A mode that involves transit with fixed schedules
A mode that is available on-demand for your personal use

departureDelay.description: duration in milliseconds (negative values permitted), https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unix_time

arrivalDelay.description: duration in milliseconds (negative values permitted), https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unix_time

token.description: The validity token (such as booking ID, travel ticket etc.) that MaaS clients will display to validate the trip when starting the leg.

validityDuration.description: The rules that MaaS will interpret to schedule, re-validate or cancel the booking.

startTime.description: The starting time from which the ticket is valid

endTime.description: The finishing time the ticket is valid for

data.description: Arbitrary ticket data for the client

meta.description: Arbitrary metadata the TSP may pass along the ticket to the client (e.g. a booking code, base64 encoded binary)
TSP/mode-specific additional information. The TSP adapter should set MODE_{mode} with defined data, otherwise 'meta' can be used freely.

image.description: Uniform resource locator, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uniform_Resource_Locator and https://mathiasbynens.be/demo/url-regex

vehicleId.description: The taxi id (in the taxi number plate on top of the vehicle)

vehicleLocation.description: Geographic latitude-longitude object in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lat.description: Geographic latitude (north-south axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

lon.description: Geographic longitude (east-west axis) in WGS-84 system, see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System

terms.description: MaaS booking terms and condition for its business engine

type.description: A type of ticket/product that this booking is valid for - should be unique within a given region, e.g. 'Single ticket / Lähiseutu 2'. When reusing the tickets in maas-backend, the 'type' field is checked for equality.

firstName.description: First name of the customer (e.g. John)

lastName.description: Last name of the customer (e.g. Doe)

phone.description: Phone number that the customer may be reached from

email.description: Email address that the customer may be reached from

product.description: Temporary way to define what kind of product has been purchased to get a ticket/booking. Will be replaced something more sophisticated once proper product system will be development.

type.description: A type of ticket/product that this booking is valid for - should be unique within a given region, e.g. 'Single ticket / Lähiseutu 2'. When reusing the tickets in maas-backend, the 'type' field is checked for equality.
